name: Race to the Top (telmo neiva)
description:
Small demo, race against other five drivers on this colourful kart maniac, be the first to finish the tree laps and bring yourself to the Top podium.
Be prepared driving a karting isn't a easy task.  When that's over and you're out on the track, these go karts pack a mean punch, so prepare yourself for the thrill.
This game was developed as part of an university assignment.       


Please very important to leave or comments/ideas bellow. for the improvement of the game  =)  

 Thanks everyone
